Recently Renovated & Minutes from Downtown Charleston and Patriot's Point Come see Charleston, South Carolina at its best when you stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Mount Pleasant - Charleston hotel. Located at the foot of the Arthur Ravenel Jr. Bridge, just off Hwy 17, it's easy to get around both Mount Pleasant and Charleston, SC. You are sure to be pleased with our newly renovated rooms and public spaces. Plus enjoy our outdoor pool, on-site laundry room, fitness center, daily housekeeping, and of course, free breakfast daily! You will find Charleston’s top attractions within a few minutes of our Mount Pleasant hotel. We are only a few miles from , Fort Moultrie, and the South Carolina Aquarium. Enjoy a day at the beach and visit nearby Isle of Palms or . Make sure you do not miss a trip to Patriot’s Point, home of the USS Yorktown, where you can also grab a ferry to the historic Fort Sumter. historic Downtown Charleston Sullivan’s Island; ranked the #1 beach in South Carolina by US News Travel Our meeting room can accommodate up to 55 people and is perfect for events. Nearby businesses include Raytheon, AT&T and Nucor, and we are also close to MUSC and College of Charleston. Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant has an outdoor pool. How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant for hotel guests. Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? Pets are welcome at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant. Our Pet Policy: We are happy to host you and your pets. The nightly pet fee is 65 dollars per night up to 2 pets. All pets must be leashed and may not be left unattended in guest rooms. Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant for a full refund? Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate. Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant have a restaurant on site? No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant. Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant. When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant is available from 6:00 AM to 9:30 AM.On weekends, breakfast is available from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant. What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant? Check-in at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Yes, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Mount Pleasant offers free WiFi!
